scripts.dev: npm run build:clean && npm run build && next
scripts.build: git clone https://github.com/love2d-community/love-api && tsx app/build/pages.ts && next build
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf love-api && rm -rf app/audio && rm -rf app/data && rm -rf app/event && rm -rf app/filesystem && rm -rf app/font && rm -rf app/graphics && rm -rf app/image && rm -rf app/joystick && rm -rf app/keyboard && rm -rf app/math && rm -rf app/mouse && rm -rf app/physics && rm -rf app/sound && rm -rf app/system && rm -rf app/thread && rm -rf app/timer && rm -rf app/window
